He withdrew from the hall and left Baobao Chan.
He addressed the crowd and rose to the hall.
He held it up.
The Sixth Patriarch instructed the crowd.
"All of you, quickly arrange your boats.
I want to go back to Xinzhou.
The disciples said.
"After the monk leaves, he'll go back.
'Sooner or later, I'll return.'
The patriarch said.
'When the leaves fall, we return to our roots.'
When he came, he had no mouth.
The master said.
"What's this talk?
What's the point of coming back after you've gone?
Don't you see the founder of Dongshan's school?
"The great and small patriarchs are still lacking in awakening.
The teacher laughed loudly and said.
"Will you people ever attain it again?
They'll listen to a verse.
'What's the point of going back to my roots?'
"The entrance to the cave is half-closed by the Qin people.
The flowers have fallen, and they've followed the flowing water far away.
They left a trail of wild clouds in the sky.
He went to Mt. Jiang.
He went up to the hall.
"Xuanshâ white paper is a costly title.
Once he heard the thundering voice, ten thousand feet low, he consoled his private thoughts, which were already immeasurable.
It's already immeasurable to console and release private thoughts.
How could he sing Rāoluo Li?
He then laughed loudly and said.
"As the old saying goes.
"It takes thirty years to laugh.
That's really true.
There was a time when I was at White Cloud.
I gathered with my senior disciple, the fruit of the Buddha, in the hall.
Their enjoyment knew no bounds.
Even now, that joy has yet to end.
He also laughed loudly and said.
"One hand doesn't slap alone.
He slapped it with both hands.
He raised his mind beyond thoughts of love.
They look at each other as strangers on the same road.
"Māyūn Jongbu is tall.
It's a crow's-foot taller than the rest of the world.
His marvelous abilities quickly thunder and lightning.
The sacred pearl isn't on his forehead.
"He treasures the great teacher of men and gods.
The first time a patched-robe monk sees it, he loses his soul.
Why is it like that?
Who would dare to look at it with a straight face?
He descended from his seat.
